name: Retrieving payment details for an existing Payment ID

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000930020222000"
When I retrieve payment details for existing Payment ID 0BV1DJGXQX56E2GX

Then I should recieve the following payment details with createDateTime 2014-02-27T06:11:44.081 and modifiedDateTime 2014-02-27T06:11:44.538:
| amount | beneficiaryId | creditorIBAN | creditorName | currency | debtorAccount | debtorIBAN | endToEndId | errorNote | fileFormatType | paymentDate | paymentPId | paymentSource | paymentStatus | paymentType | remittanceInformation1 | remittanceInformation2 | remittanceInformation3 | remittanceInformation4 |
| 10 | 00000006 |  |  | EUR | 93236111602718 | IE98AIBK93236111602718 | 0871000022 |  | MobileTopUp23 | 2014-02-27 | 0BV1DJGXQX56E2GX | ibank | REJECTED | PaymentMobileTopup |  |  |  |  |

title: Retrieving payment details for an existing Payment ID
